shortDescription: Snapchat is a multimedia messaging app that allows users to share moments with friends and family through ephemeral photos and videos. It's designed for a younger audience looking for quick, fun ways to communicate. Users can enhance their interactions with a variety of Lenses and Filters, making each snap unique. An example use case is sharing a quick video update with personalized filters to a group of friends.
pros: Wide variety of filters and lenses
Strong focus on privacy with ephemeral messages
cons: Primarily appeals to a younger demographic
Potential for misuse with privacy features
